channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Litter scattered over the pavement, 30th October
item.description:
There are litter scattered over the pavement from the rubbish bags dumped outside the pavement of 33-34 Manchester Street

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Manchester Street, Marylebone, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ongoing Issue around Moreton House, Slippers Place, 30th October
item.description:
There is always a constant trail of Dog poo waste around the communal pathways around Moreton House, it is concerning for peoples sanitary and health as people keep stepping into and bringin it back to their homes. There are lots of small children living around in the House and the smell and waste keep reappering. Almost everyday a new Poo appears. This has to be stopped

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gataker Street, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Many bin bags are left by the park fence opposite Council Estate on Tyers Gate. With rodent attacks & street littering, the street is full of scattered rubbish on daily bases., 30th October
item.description:
Bin bags should not be allowed to be left on street and overflowing rubbish blown onto street from Council Estate waste bins add the problem to the situation worse. It is a public health hazard. Please enforce the penalty and install an official sign to prohibit waste disposal on street by the park fence.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Tyers Gate, The Borough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There are pebbles/ stones in the road by the roundabout in Brook St/ Bexley Road up until Mill Rd which have been dropped by a lorry a require clearing ASAP, 30th October
item.description:
There are pebbles/ stones in the road from the roundabout on corner by the roundabout in Brook St/ Bexley Road up until Mill Road which have been dropped by a lorry a require clearing ASAP as resident is concerned about this being a danger to children walking in this area.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brook Street, Northumberland Heath, London

item.title: Unnecessary street diversion sign, 30th October
item.description:
A2 traffic diversion sign in middle of pavement outside 28 Townley Road keeps blowing over in wind , if it’s necessary it needs fixing more securely. Visually impaired person fell over it the other day as it was blocking the pavement
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Townley Road, Bexley, London
